title.rendered: Top 10 Mobile App Development Agencies in India 2024

content.rendered:
The demand for mobile app development services in India and worldwide is increasing rapidly as more and more people are switching to smartphones. With the emergence of various mobile app development agencies, it has become difficult to determine the best one for your business. In this article, we will explore everything that you need to know about the top 10 mobile app development agencies in India in 2023.

Table of Contents

Toggle
  • Which is the Best Mobile App Development Company in India?
  • List of Top 10 Mobile App Development Companies In India
    • 1. AppInventiv:
    • 2. EZ Rankings:
    • 3. Appro Labs:
    • 4. Xeliumtech Solutions:
    • 5. FuGenX Technologies:
    • 6. Mobulous:
    • 7. IndianAppDevelopers:
    • 8. Sanesquare Technologies:
    • 9. TechnoScore:
    • 10. Contus Tech:
  • How Can Businesses Get Benefit From Mobile App Development Services?
    • 1. Reach a Wider Target Audience:
    • 2. Improve Customer Engagement and Loyalty:
    • 3. Increase Brand Visibility:
    • 4. Streamline Operations:
    • 5. Better scalability:
  • The Cost Of Mobile App Development and Benefits Of Outsource To India:
    • 1. Type of app:
    • 2. Platform:
    • 3. Level of complexity:
  • Hire Top App Developers In India That Offer Best Digital Services To Your Audience!
  • Wrapping up!
  • FAQs
    • Q. What are the benefits of outsourcing mobile app development to India?
    • Q. What factors influence the cost of app development?
    • Q. What are some of the best mobile app development companies in India?
    • Q. How can businesses ensure the success of their mobile app?
    • Q. How much time does it take to develop an app?

Which is the Best Mobile App Development Company in India?

With so many options, it can be tricky to decide whom to consider for your mobile app development needs. While choosing the best mobile app development Company for your business, you should assess their technical capabilities, quality of work, and customer service. The companies should offer you the best solutions to meet your requirements and provide timely services.

Moreover, they should also offer advanced features and solutions such as AI-based solutions, IoT integrations, cloud infrastructure support, UX/UI design services, and so on. To help you find the right agency, here are the top 10 mobile app development agencies in India in 2024.

List of Top 10 Mobile App Development Companies In India

1. AppInventiv:

About: AppInventiv is one of the leading mobile app development companies in India, with offices located in Delhi NCR, USA, UK, and UAE. They offer comprehensive mobile app development solutions that include Android, iOS, Windows Phone, and Cross-Platform apps. Their developers are well-versed with the latest development tools and technologies across platforms.

  • Core Services: Web and mobile development
  • Year of establishment: 2014
  • Location: Noida, India, United States, Australia, UK, France, UAE
  • Clientele: They cater to all small, medium, and large businesses
  • Awards: App Development Company of the Year 2020
  • Reviews: 4.1/5
  • Pricing: $10,000+
  • Employee Size: 501 to 1,000
  • Portfolio: appinventiv.com/portfolio
  • Contact Details: +91 8448182018

 

2. EZ Rankings:

About: EZ Rankings is an award-winning digital marketing agency in India that specializes in mobile app development services. With a team of highly skilled app developers, the company helps businesses build innovative and customer-centric mobile applications. Their professionals are experts in developing enterprise mobile applications, prototyping, and UI/UX design.

  • Core Services: SEO, SEM, Web & Mobile App Development
  • Year of establishment: 2010
  • Location: Noida, Delhi, India, USA, Canada
  • Clientele: Small, medium and large industries
  • Awards: Multiple awards for development, SEO, and SEM
  • Reviews: 4.4/5
  • Pricing: $10,000+
  • Employee Size: 100-250
  • Portfolio: ezrankings.com/portfolio
  • Contact Details: +91 95601 33711

 

3. Appro Labs:

About: Appro Labs is a mobile app development agency in India that focuses on providing comprehensive mobile solutions for businesses. Their experienced developers make use of the latest technology, tools, and frameworks to create high-performance apps. They also offer custom mobile app development services for different platforms like Android, iOS, Windows, etc. They are experts in creating applications for startups, SMEs, and large enterprises. Moreover, they also provide detailed consultation and analysis for your mobile app development project.

  • Core Services: App development, web development
  • Year of establishment: 2018
  • Location: Chennai, India
  • Clientele: Medium and small businesses
  • Awards: Among the best app development companies by Clutch
  • Reviews: 5/5
  • Pricing: $5,000+
  • Employee Size: 11 to 50
  • Portfolio: approlabs.com/portfolio
  • Contact Details: +91 9445537735

 

4. Xeliumtech Solutions:

About: Xeliumtech Solutions is renowned for its exceptional mobile app development services. The company has a proven track record of delivering high-quality projects in various industries like eCommerce, education, healthcare, and more. They offer a wide range of services including Android app development, iOS app development, cross-platform app development, and enterprise apps. In addition, they also provide advanced technologies like Machine Learning, Augmented Reality (AR), and Virtual Reality (VR).

  • Core Services: App development, DevOps, web development
  • Year of establishment: 2010
  • Location: Gurugram, Haryana, India, United States of America, United Kingdom
  • Clientele: Medium and large enterprises
  • Awards: None
  • Reviews: 4.4/5
  • Pricing: $10,000+
  • Employee Size: 100-250
  • Portfolio: xeliumtech.com/portfolio
  • Contact Details: +91 8800464848

 

5. FuGenX Technologies:

About: FuGenX is one of the most experienced mobile app development companies in India. They offer services for Android, iOS, Blackberry, and Windows platforms. This company has won several awards for their innovative and cutting-edge mobile solutions. They are known for their excellent customer service and on-time delivery of projects. If you’re looking for a reliable and experienced mobile app development agency, FuGenX is the right choice for you.

  • Core Services: Mobile development, web development, enterprise solutions
  • Year of establishment: 2008
  • Location: Bengaluru, Karnataka
  • Clientele: Small, medium, and large enterprises
  • Awards: Tech Fast50 and Fast500 awards
  • Reviews: 3.2/5
  • Pricing: $10,000+
  • Employee Size: 100-250
  • Portfolio: portfolio.fugenx.com
  • Contact Details: +91-9154181592

 

6. Mobulous:

About: Mobulous is a top-tier mobile app development agency based in India. It offers comprehensive services for Android and iOS app development, as well as expertise in web and cloud app development. Mobulous is an ideal choice for businesses seeking to create feature-rich, intuitive apps that offer a great user experience. They also offer services such as UX/UI design, MVP development, cloud infrastructure support, and more.

  • Core Services: Mobile development, enterprise services, web development
  • Year of establishment: 2013
  • Location: Noida, India
  • Clientele: Small and medium enterprises
  • Awards: The Best App Development Company In India by GCBT
  • Reviews: 4.3/5
  • Pricing: $10,000+
  • Employee Size: 50-100
  • Portfolio:  mobulous.com/portfolio
  • Contact Details: +91-9650100411

 

7. IndianAppDevelopers:

About: This is one of the top mobile app development companies in India. They specialize in developing Android, iOS, and Hybrid apps for businesses of all sizes. The company has a team of experienced developers adept in the latest technology trends. They provide end-to-end mobile app development services including UX/UI design, API integrations, testing & deployment, and so on. IndianAppDevelopers team is also known for their timely delivery and quality work.

  • Core Services: Mobile, web, and digital transformation
  • Year of establishment: 2013
  • Location: Ahmedabad, India
  • Clientele: Medium, and small companies
  • Awards: D-Tech Award
  • Reviews: 4/5
  • Pricing: $5000+
  • Employee Size: 10-49
  • Portfolio: indianappdevelopers.com/portfolio
  • Contact Details: +91 9428807020

 

8. Sanesquare Technologies:

About: Founded in 2016, Sanesquare Technologies is an innovative mobile app development company in India that creates high-quality business applications. Their team of experienced developers specializes in iOS, Android, and cross-platform app development. Sanesquare Technologies also offers bespoke solutions such as blockchain development, artificial intelligence, and machine learning integration. In addition, they provide swift customer support and maintenance services.

  • Core Services: Mobile, web, and CRM development
  • Year of establishment: 2019
  • Location: Kerala, India
  • Clientele: Small, medium, and large companies
  • Awards: None
  • Reviews: 4.6/5
  • Pricing: $10,000+
  • Employee Size: 50-100
  • Portfolio: None
  • Contact Details: +91 790 7608 225

 

9. TechnoScore:

About: TechnoScore is a mobile app development agency with over 10 years of experience in the industry. They specialize in custom mobile application solutions for Android, iOS, and Web platforms. TechnoScore offers end-to-end mobile app development services from strategy to design, development, testing, and launch. Moreover, they’re expertise in AI and IoT integrations, cloud infrastructure services, UX/UI design, and more.

  • Core Services: Mobile apps, web, IoT, Blockchain
  • Year of establishment: 1999
  • Location: Delhi, India, USA, UK
  • Clientele: Small, medium, and large industries
  • Awards: Globee Business Awards winner
  • Reviews: 5/5
  • Pricing: $5,000+
  • Employee Size: 201-500
  • Portfolio:  technoscore.com/portfolio
  • Contact Details: +91 888 269 6096

 

10. Contus Tech:

About: Contus Tech is a renowned mobile app development agency in India with over 10 years of experience and 100+ successful projects completed. They offer Android, iOS, and Cross-Platform app development services, as well as ERP solutions, cloud services, and web development. Moreover, they have an extensive library of products and services to make sure that your business needs are met with the best solutions.

  • Core Services: Mobile development, digital transformation, blockchain
  • Year of establishment: 2008
  • Location: Chennai, India, USA
  • Clientele: Small and medium enterprises
  • Awards: Best Employer Brand award
  • Reviews: 4/5
  • Pricing: $15,000+
  • Employee Size: 201-500
  • Portfolio: contus.com/mobile-app-portfolio
  • Contact Details: +91 98407 05435

 

How Can Businesses Get Benefit From Mobile App Development Services?

There are several advantages that businesses can gain from mobile app development services. It helps them reach a wider target audience, improve customer engagement and loyalty, increase brand visibility, and streamline operations.

Let’s dive into the details of each advantage:

1. Reach a Wider Target Audience:

Mobile apps are one of the most effective ways to reach more customers. It helps businesses target a wider audience by engaging them with personalized notifications, messages, and content. Moreover, it allows businesses to gather data on their customers, which can be used to create customized experiences for them.

2. Improve Customer Engagement and Loyalty:

Mobile apps enable businesses to interact with customers in real time, which helps to build stronger relationships and trust. A personalized mobile app experience can increase customer engagement and loyalty to the business, as customers feel more connected to the brand. Moreover, when it comes to retention, mobile apps can help businesses keep their customers engaged with discounts, promotions, and other incentives.

3. Increase Brand Visibility:

By having a presence in the mobile space, businesses can reach a larger audience and increase their visibility. It also helps them to gain trust and build credibility, as more customers will be exposed to the brand. Moreover, businesses can use their mobile app to showcase their products and services to potential customers.

4. Streamline Operations:

Having a mobile app can save businesses a lot of time and money by streamlining operations. It helps to automate tasks, such as scheduling appointments, sending notifications, and gathering customer data. In addition, it can also be used to manage inventory, track orders, and process payments.

5. Better scalability:

Mobile app development services provide businesses with better scalability and flexibility. With the help of mobile solutions, businesses can easily scale up their operations with less effort and time. Moreover, mobile apps offer features that are not available in traditional applications, such as location-based services, augmented reality, and push notifications.

The Cost Of Mobile App Development and Benefits Of Outsource To India:

When you outsource your app development to an Indian app development agency, you can get high-quality solutions at a fraction of the cost. Moreover, India has some of the best mobile developers in the world, who are highly skilled and experienced. Additionally, the government of India is offering incentives to businesses that choose to hire Indian developers. This means that businesses can save money by outsourcing their app development to India. On this note, let’s look at the factors influencing the cost of app development:

1. Type of app:

The type of app you are developing will have an impact on the cost of development. If you want a feature-rich, complex app with multiple functions, it will cost more. However, if you are looking for a basic app with limited features, then the development cost will be lower. Moreover, native apps tend to be more expensive than hybrid or web apps. On the other hand, web apps are usually the most cost-effective option.

2. Platform:

The platform you are targeting will also influence the cost of development. If you want to develop an app for both iOS and Android, it will cost more than developing an app for just one platform. Moreover, the cost of development may also vary depending on the operating system version.

3. Level of complexity:

The level of complexity of the app will have an impact on the cost of development. If you want to build a complex app with multiple features and integrations, then it will cost more. On the other hand, if you are looking to develop a basic app, then the cost of development tend to be lower.

Hire Top App Developers In India That Offer Best Digital Services To Your Audience!

Hire the best mobile app development companies in India like EZ Rankings and thrive in the digital world. Our team of passionate mobile developers and UI/UX designers are committed to building you a feature-rich, reliable, and user-friendly app. Moreover, we also offer comprehensive digital services like Search Engine Optimization, Social Media, Pay Per Click, content writing, and more to help you engage with your target audiences. With our expertise, you can create a strong online presence and grow your business faster than ever.

Wrapping up!

Overall, businesses can benefit greatly by developing mobile apps. They can reach a wider target audience, increase customer engagement and loyalty, boost brand visibility, streamline operations, and get better scalability. Moreover, they can save money by outsourcing their app development to Indian agencies. It is important for businesses to choose the right agency for their development needs, as it can have a huge impact on the success or failure of their app.

In 2023 where the competition is high, it is important to choose the best and most reliable mobile app development agency in India. So, it’s high time to take a look advantage of the list of top 10 mobile app development agencies in India that can deliver high-quality and reliable services.

FAQs

Q. What are the benefits of outsourcing mobile app development to India?

Ans. Outsourcing your mobile app development to India can offer numerous benefits such as cost-saving, access to skilled and experienced developers, flexible service packages, etc.

Q. What factors influence the cost of app development?

Ans. The factors that influence the cost of app development include the type of app, platform, level of complexity, etc.

Q. What are some of the best mobile app development companies in India?

Ans. Some of the top mobile app development companies in India include EZ Rankings, AppInventiv, and all other above-mentioned companies.

Q. How can businesses ensure the success of their mobile app?

Ans. Businesses can ensure the success of their mobile app by choosing the right agency for their development needs, focusing on user experience and engagement, and leveraging the right marketing strategies.

Q. How much time does it take to develop an app?

Ans. The time taken to develop an app depends on the type of app, its complexity, and other factors. Generally, it takes around 4 to 5 months to build a basic app.
